title: Creating an Equation
text: The complementary angles add to 90 and have a difference of 17 degrees. So, we have: $$x+y=90, x-y=17$$

title: Elimination
text: We can eliminate y from this equation by adding them together. We get $$2x=107$$.

title: Solving for X, Y
text: $$x=\frac{107}{2}$$, $$x=53.5$$. Plugging this into an original equation, we get $$y=36.5$$.
